title: Everyday
text: Everyday, affordable, trending,  "synthetic" apparel for everywhere ! Vs other brands. Now, the brick and mortar stores with the employees are rude !

title: Return To Your Winning Identity
text: Hello, I logged on to the RainbowShops.com App on my phone to do some Birthday shopping for my wife (Yes, I'm a man) and the website shut down on me in the middle of it. I believe that it was about an hour later when a Customer Satisfaction Agent reached out to me via text because apparently she noticed that I hadn't finished adding merchandise to my cart or making a purchase. Also, for some ungodly reason, the selection wasn't good either. It didn't seem to matter whether I was looking for decent matching sets or individual pieces to put together to come up with a few stylish outfits, this batch of clothes just wasn't as good as usual. I've been having this account for SEVERAL years now, and I believe that this was the worst I've ever seen Rainbow advertise. There were wayyyy too many mid-drift, see-through, and just plain old bad patterns with style miscues.

title: Okay but, needs an overhaul
text: The price points seem pretty good on most items but you need a better selection and much more forward fashion especially in your plus sizes.  Some of the clothes show the obvious poor quality, are ill-fitting and not well made and it is evident even on the models.

title: This was my first time ordering online…
text: This was my first time ordering online from Rainbows. I ordered 4 pairs of shorts and two skirts. I was very disappointed with the quality of the clothes. I am an elderly woman and the materials used in these clothes are very thin, cheap looking and NOT flattering at all. So, I probably won't be ordering from the website again. Thank you

title: First time online Rainbows experience …
text: I enjoy shopping at rainbows for certain items in-store however, this was my first time shopping online and I was quite disappointed to be honest.  Expected to see the items that are available in-store online as well. Unfortunately every time I pressed on the item I wanted it was sold out.. I suggest that sold out items should be taken down off site. Also to restock the plus sized turtleneck selection. Thank you

title: Wish the site had categories to better…
text: Wish the site had categories to better find things I might like instead of trying to go through 18 pages of mixed pieces. I stopped at page 3 or 4 once I found the leggings I wanted, but if there were categories, I probably would have spent more time and money. Going through smaller categories is nicer than going through entire inventory in one long run.

title: Kindly stated
text: Kindly stated, pages are fairly easy to navigate. There could be some improvement on returning to the exact same images after viewing one then hitting the back button. The site could also adjust the response time when buttons are hit; it was as bit slow (and it was not my internet or 5G connection). And lastly it would help if the site did not require confirmation as to whether the potential customer wants to continue shopping; just add the items to the cart without all of the extra.

title: Love the items and prices
text: Love the items and prices! I had trouble creating the account.  I hated having my cart go empty  several times while still shopping, that was very frustrating, couldn’t remember all the items I had placed in my cart.  I was uneasy with the sizing, I’m usually an 8 ,choices were 7 or 9, a customer review would be helpful with sizing. Overall happy to be able to purchase on line!

title: You should have a in-store free…
text: You should have a in-store free shipping method available for customers that want to pick up at a store location. It is much harder to pick $100 of clothes (since they are not as nice as years back) in order to receive the free shipping with minimum amount on delivery. Really disappointed……..

title: More Selections Please
text: The clothing ( jeans) that brought me to the website was only available in limited sizes, or was no longer available. The filter ( by size) really limited my selection even more. I had to be creative in my selection technique to find more items in my size, or that interested me.

title: Y’all need free shipping for jewelry or buy online but free pickup in store
text: Had a really good discount for jewelry but not much of a discount anymore because you guys give no option to buy online but pickup in store for free especially for jewelry. The jewelry bought was only online so I HAD to purchase online. Y’all should have free delivery or even if the item isn’t in store & is only online y’all should have free store pickup. Ended up paying $30 for some fake jewelry cause of shipping costs. Ridiculous

title: Plus Size Shopper
text: Rainbow always offer clothes that are fun to wear and trendy. The company also offers a wide selection. I am a plus size woman who often shops at Rainbow online and in stores. However, on this visit online there wasn't a wide selection of tops for plus size women. I was only able to find two incredible pieces and at a good price.

title: I love rainbow because it sticks to its…
text: I love rainbow because it sticks to its business model, understands its customer in all ways. It feels like in spite of economics and size you try to help women feel beautiful . I have wishes that Rainbow would have sizes in plus that are not the Chinese plus sizes and that bra manufacturers understood that big breasts with  small chest size are not the norm. Band width counts . One more wish , that underwear for big women was made with pretty in mind. Thank you for everything else ,you have made a difference in my life,

title: I like shopping at Rainbow but when I…
text: I like shopping at Rainbow but when I purchase an order my shipment from FedEx is always tendered or fail to make attempt delivery or order is pending. No one came by or attempted to make a delivery. Someone is at the house all day. My package were to be delivered on June 25th. Its June 27th no delivery. FedEx delivery service is horrible and it is not getting no better. Rainbow I use to be a valuable customer but your carrier is horrible.

title: I like shopping with rainbow online…

This has been totally indigenous to me.  Other than that the experience has been good.

title: Reasonable prices not alot of stock!
text: I just placed my online order, haven't actually received the items yet. So can't review the quality, but the prices are really good especially for young girls clothing. However the size 8-10 girls in almost every single 2 piece outfit was not available, as well as most dresses and pants. This is the one size I was actually shopping for. I would have probably spent alot more money if they actually had the sizes that I needed.***Edited for quality of clothing****  Unfortunately the quality was not great ....the stitching on the sweat pants and zip up sweater were very poor. A hole appeared in the crotch after just one wear, and balling on the material after one wash....disappointing.

title: It’s hard to tell how the clothes actually fit
text: While I love Rainbow selections and prices, I find it hard to shop. In my area there isn’t a store close so I mostly shop online. The problem that I have is your models all have flat stomachs so it’s hard to see how the clothes will actually fall on me. I’m a short woman wearing a size 22, I would like to see how the clothes look on my body type and I don’t see how that’s asking a lot from a store with a large plus size line. A person wearing a 10 or 1x should not be modeling the entire plus size line because it’s just not helpful.

This made me lose my place a lot. Also after clicking and item and going back I would have to take off any custom search options to see any products. Then I would need to reapply filters each time. The wishlist is also having problems. I was first using my computer to add everything online but when I wanted to continue by using the app on my phone, none of my saved wishlist items were there. Even after signing in again to see a difference. One last thing is on the wishlist it’s hard to see everything because it’s lined up in a row and this makes it difficult to decide what to get. I wish there were like rows of 3 so it would be easier to get to things. And also the wishlist should be organizable or filter able so things can be grouped together and make it easier to decide.  My favorite thing on the site is easy access and simple look of the guide to certain pages. I also like the red labeling on things on sale.  Though simplistic the webpage seems kind of boring for a place called rainbow. Some nice color schemes or unique effects can make the site seem more memorable. I would also give customers the option to select more than one size because sizes may vary depending on the product. Such as slides not being available in half sizes sometimes.  Thank you for your time and for asking for my customer experience.P.S I love making online sites :)

title: Product Pricing/Availability is a Plus. No Customer Rewards is Not
text: Overall, I'm satisfied with my experience shopping online with Rainbow Shops. I do have 2 suggestions to improve customer experience. #1. When removing an item from the cart on both mobile & desktop, the images & description of remaining items in cart are not accurately displayed. i.e. the item image doesn't match the item description. This can cause items to be removed from the cart in error. To correct this issue I had to click the Cart icon, which updated the page.#2. This is an important one: Some type of Reward, discount, or other incentive should be offered to customers based upon the amount being spent, frequency of repeat shopping etc. Today, I spent over $500 with "free shipping" for my order meeting or exceeding $75. This is not a real incentive anymore due to nationwide shipping delays; even paying for expedited shipping doesn't mean items will be received as estimated. Side note: 2 of my orders were placed prior to 10:00 am est. today; it's now 8:45 pm est. & neither order has even been prepared for shipping. I know staffing is an issue everywhere; with that in mind, if orders placed & paid for prior to noon cannot be prepared for shipping the same day; having to meet a $75 limit to get free standard shipping that's going to take additional processing time prior to even being ready to ship, is not an incentive or reward to your customers. All that said  🤣 I am pleased with product availability in plus sizes & pricing.

title: The App is slow
text: The App is slow. Navigation on the App is not simple and disorganized. The fliter/sort system is very basic. You have to know exactly what you looking for to sort. Sometimes I just want to be able to browse and sort/fliter as I go. Also, measurements for specific clothing would be nice. For example if I am looking at a 1x shirt, be nice to know the exact measurements of that shirt size.

title: I tried placing an order online and was…
text: I tried placing an order online and was unable to complete it because some items wouldn’t ship to my address but it wouldn’t tell me which ones. After a lot of frustration and calling customer service, I was told that because I live in California some accessories cannot be shipped to me. Perhaps that should be mentioned on the specific items. I was told that if you order on the app it does tell you which items don’t ship to California. I removed the accessories and then I was able to place my order.
